metadata.title: CVE-2022-1705 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Acceptance of some invalid Transfer-Encoding headers in the HTTP/1 clientin net/http before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4 allows HTTP request smugglingif combined with an intermediate server that also improperly fails toreject the header as invalid.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
